verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H561>words<s%>, and lay <S%H6845>up<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> with thee.
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%>; and my <S%H8451>law<s%> as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eye<s%>.
<S%H7194>Bind<s%> them upon thy <S%H676>fingers<s%>, <S%H3789>write<s%> them upon the <S%H3871>table<s%> of thine <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
<S%H559>Say<s%> unto <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, Thou art my <S%H269>sister<s%>; and <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> thy <S%H4129>kinswoman<s%>:
That they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee from the <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, from the <S%H5237>stranger<s%> which <S%H2505>flattereth<s%> with her <S%H561>words<s%>.
For at the <S%H2474>window<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> I <S%H8259>looked<s%> through my <S%H822>casement<s%>,

And <S%H7200>beheld<s%> among the simple <S%H6612>ones<s%>, I <S%H995>discerned<s%> among the <S%H1121>youths<s%>, a young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>, the youths: Heb. the sons
Passing <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H7784>street<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> her <S%H6434>corner<s%>; and he <S%H6805>went<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to her <S%H1004>house<s%>,
In the <S%H5399>twilight<s%>, in the <S%H3117>evening<s%> <S%H6153><s%>, in the <S%H380>black<s%> and <S%H653>dark<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%>: in the evening: Heb. in the evening of day
And, behold, there <S%H7125>met<s%> him a <S%H802>woman<s%> with the <S%H7897>attire<s%> of an <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, and <S%H5341>subtil<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
(She is <S%H1993>loud<s%> and <S%H5637>stubborn<s%>; her <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7931>abide<s%> not in her <S%H1004>house<s%>:
<S%H6471>Now<s%> is she <S%H2351>without<s%>, <S%H6471>now<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%>, and lieth in <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H681>at<s%> every <S%H6438>corner<s%>.)
So she <S%H2388>caught<s%> him, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him, and with an <S%H5810>impudent<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, with: Heb. she strengthened her face and said
I have <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> with me; this <S%H3117>day<s%> have I <S%H7999>payed<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%>. I have: Heb. Peace offerings are upon me
Therefore came I <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> thee, diligently to <S%H7836>seek<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, and I have <S%H4672>found<s%> thee.
I have <S%H7234>decked<s%> my <S%H6210>bed<s%> with <S%H4765>coverings<s%> of tapestry, with <S%H2405>carved<s%> works, with fine <S%H330>linen<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
I have <S%H5130>perfumed<s%> my <S%H4904>bed<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh<s%>, <S%H174>aloes<s%>, and <S%H7076>cinnamon<s%>.
<S%H3212>Come<s%>, let us take our <S%H7301>fill<s%> of <S%H1730>love<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>: let us <S%H5965>solace<s%> ourselves with <S%H159>loves<s%>.
For the <S%H376>goodman<s%> is not at <S%H1004>home<s%>, he is <S%H1980>gone<s%> a <S%H7350>long<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%>:

He hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H6872>bag<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> with <S%H3027>him<s%>, and will <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> at the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3677>appointed<s%>. with: Heb. in his hand the day: or, the new moon
With her <S%H7230>much<s%> fair <S%H3948>speech<s%> she caused him to <S%H5186>yield<s%>, with the <S%H2506>flattering<s%> of her <S%H8193>lips<s%> she <S%H5080>forced<s%> him.

He <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her <S%H6597>straightway<s%>, as an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H935>goeth<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%>, or as a <S%H191>fool<s%> to the <S%H4148>correction<s%> of the <S%H5914>stocks<s%>; straightway: Heb. suddenly

Till a <S%H2671>dart<s%> <S%H6398>strike<s%> through his <S%H3516>liver<s%>; as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H4116>hasteth<s%> to the <S%H6341>snare<s%>, and <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> not that it is for his <S%H5315>life<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hearken<s%> unto me now therefore, O ye <S%H1121>children<s%>, and <S%H7181>attend<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Let not thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7847>decline<s%> to her <S%H1870>ways<s%>, go not <S%H8582>astray<s%> in her <S%H5410>paths<s%>.
For she hath cast <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H2491>wounded<s%>: yea, many <S%H6099>strong<s%> men have been <S%H2026>slain<s%> by her.
Her <S%H1004>house<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7585>hell<s%>, going <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.
